DataElement.preferredName: Regulatory Authority Or Monitoring Regulation Management Authority Professional Organization or Group Effective Date and Time Range ISO21090.IVL.TS.DATETIME.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date and time span for when the regulatory authority is active.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Regulatory Authority Or Monitoring Regulation Management Authority Professional Organization or Group Effective Date and Time Range
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A geopolitical organization responsible for regulating products used in health care.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:The act of observing something (and sometimes keeping a record of it).:A rule or order issued by an authority stating what may or may not be done or how something must be done.:The act of conducting, controlling or supervising something.:A person or group with the power or right to give orders or make decisions for a particular area of activity.:A formal group of people that exists to further a particular profession._Existing in fact and ready for service.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.:The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.

Concepts.definition: A geopolitical organization responsible for regulating products used in health care.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
The act of observing something (and sometimes keeping a record of it).
A rule or order issued by an authority stating what may or may not be done or how something must be done.
The act of conducting, controlling or supervising something.
A person or group with the power or right to give orders or make decisions for a particular area of activity.
A formal group of people that exists to further a particular profession.

Property.preferredDefinition: Existing in fact and ready for service.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.:The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.

Concepts.definition: Existing in fact and ready for service.
An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.
The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.
